name: jira-flow
description: A CLI tool to link commits with JIRA issues.
author: Jaleel Bennett <jaleelbennett58@gmail.com>

scripts.bump-version: pnpx version-bump-prompt && pnpm run prepublish && git add package.json && git commit -m 'chore(release): bump version' && npm version $(node -pe "require('./package.json').version") && git push && git push --tags
